response.headline: Tokyo shopping tip: Visit Kichijoji suburb instead of crowded Shinjuku & Shibuya for relaxed atmosphere with major brands
response.summary: Kichijoji is a hidden gem suburb in Tokyo that tourists don't know about. It offers a more relaxed, stress-free shopping atmosphere compared to crowded Shinjuku and Shibuya areas, while still having all the big Japanese brands available.

extracted_text: If you're tired of the crowded Shinjuku & Shibuya areas, go to a suburb called KICHIJOJI
A hidden gem which not many tourists know of
But all the big Japanese brands are there
Not many tourists know this suburb called Kichijoji. Everything was so calm
image_details.key_interest: Kichijoji as alternative shopping destination in Tokyo
visual_hierarchy: Benefits: not crowded, relaxed, no stress
